attributes.action: Make Jeremy Corbyn do all the jobs in his Shadow Cabinet and be a one man party.
attributes.additional_details: Its a great way of labour saving money, in this time of austerity
attributes.background: We are deeply saddened by the resignations in the Shadow Cabinet, so instead of Mr Corbyn spending his valuable time recruiting; he can do all the job of the shadow cabinet himself.

rejection.details: Appointments to the shadow Cabinet are an internal party matter, and not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament as a whole.
